title: Bug 101187: Localization key is required when adding and cannot be blank
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key is required when adding and cannot be blank.

Description: When the key field is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
Steps to reproduce:1. Open the chart configuration interface.
2. Set an externalized text in the chart title.
3. Attempt to save the chart configuration without entering a localization key.
OB: The system allows saving the chart configuration without a localization key.
EB: The system should display an error message indicating that the localization key cannot be blank and prevent the chart configuration from being saved.
SR:
1. Open the chart configuration interface.
2. Set an externalized text in the chart title.
3. Attempt to save the chart configuration without entering a localization key.
4. Confirm that an error message is displayed and the chart configuration is not saved when attempting to save without a localization key.
